title: Opinion: Patrick Lefevere, Cycling’s Unapologetic Kingmaker, Says Goodbye with Mixed Legacy
content:
His career spanned a huge period of societal change, in which opinions, once characterized as 'plain-speaking,' have become seen as divisive, uneducated, and even offensive.

Read the full article at Opinion: Patrick Lefevere, Cycling’s Unapologetic Kingmaker, Says Goodbye with Mixed Legacy on Velo.
author: ahood
